metadata.title: CVE-2022-0544 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An integer underflow in the DDS loader of Blender leads to an out-of-boundsread, possibly allowing an attacker to read sensitive data using a craftedDDS image file. This flaw affects Blender versions prior to 2.83.19, 2.93.8and 3.1.

criterions.comment: blender package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
